definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: His hometown is located in the north to the tropic of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 他的家乡在北回归线的北面。

sentences.english: Because of the Tropic of Cancer and the Trans-Ba Bao Tong had opened up to astronomical Park.
sentences.chinese: 因北回归线横贯八宝塘而过，开辟为天文公园。

sentences.english: Daming Mountain is located on the Tropic of Cancer and has its own positional characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 大明山位于北回归线上，具有其独特的区位特征。

sentences.english: between the Arctic Circle and the Tropic of Cancer.
sentences.chinese: 位于北极圈和北回归线之间。

sentences.english: In China, the Tropic of Cancer cuts through Guangdong province.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，北回归线空过广东省。

sentences.english: Latitude 25N, has the obvious characteristic of tropic area.
sentences.chinese: 北纬25度临近于北回归线，具有明显的回归带特征。

sentences.english: Tropic of capricorn and cancer is the furthest latitude of sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 南北回归线是日照直射点的最远纬度。

sentences.english: Which three countries are all crossed by the Tropic of Cancer?
sentences.chinese: 下列哪个选项中的三个国家，都有北回归线通过？

sentences.english: Hawaii, the area south of the Tropic of Cancer, a tropical climate.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷北回归线以南的地区，属于热带气候。

sentences.english: Hawaii located on the tropic of cancer, is a tropical climate south.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷州位于北回归线以内，属热带气候。

sentences.english: Dionysus walked across the tropic of cancer, his pain and ecstasy is on fire.
sentences.chinese: 狄俄尼索斯走过北回归线，掀起痛苦和狂喜。

sentences.english: The Tropic of Cancer crosses which three countries on the Arabian Peninsula?
sentences.chinese: 北回归线穿过阿拉伯半岛的哪三个国家？

sentences.english: Hawaii in the south of the Tropic of Cancer, is a tropical climate zone .
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷州位于北回归线以南，属热带气候区。

sentences.english: South on the Tropic of Cancer small town, the leaf very little falls ground.
sentences.chinese: 北回归线以南的小镇上，树叶很少落到地上。

definition: equator (of the earth or astronomical body)
tropic/one of the two latitude lines, Tropic of Capricorn or Tropic of Cancer
geographic latitude (i.e. angle between the equatorial plane and the normal to the reference ellipsoid)
Yunnan and Guizhou plateau in southwest China, covering east Yunnan, whole of Guizhou, west of Guangxi and southern margins of Sichuan, Hubei and Hunan
